fields.headline: How to DIY it
fields.bodyText: Shops and slopes Ski trip or city break? You can have both if you choose Grenoble as your midwinter escape. On the one hand it's a lively student town known for its cultural attractions and shopping, on the other it's only a short bus ride from the slopes that hosted the 1968 Winter Olympics. Both Ryanair (ryanair.com) and easyJet (easyjet.com) fly there, from Stansted and Luton respectively, but to get the best deal, consider combining the two. Visit
